revision.text:
'''Gyms''' are special areas in Pokéclicker where the player can earn gym badges and unlock new routes by defeating the gym leader in a battle. There are 8 gyms in each region plus the Pokémon League building, which includes the Elite 4 trainers and the champion. [[File:Badge case.png|thumb|350px]] ====[[Kanto]] Gyms (Work in Progress)==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Location !! Badge !! Leader !! Money Earned !! Pokémon !! HP !! Weakness |- | rowspan=2 | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]]|| rowspan=2 | Boulder || rowspan=2 | Brock || rowspan=2 | 250 || Geodude || 770 || (X4) Water, Grass
(x2) Fighting, Ground, Steel, Ice |- || Onix || 1554 || (X4) Water, Grass
(x2) Fighting, Ground, Steel, Ice |- | rowspan=2 | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]]|| rowspan=2 | Cascade || rowspan=2 | Misty || rowspan=2 | 500 || Staryu || 4000 || (x2) Grass, Electric |- || Starmie || 6800 || (x2) Bug, Ghost, Grass, Electric, Dark |- || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermilion City]] || Thunder || Lt. '''Gyms''' are special areas in Pokéclicker where the player can earn gym badges and unlock new routes by defeating the gym leader in a battle. There are 8 gyms in each region plus the Pokémon League building, which includes the Elite 4 trainers and the champion.
